name: Zoo Tycoon 2 Object File
summary: Learn about .Z2F files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Z2F files may come with a .DL file when downloaded. Both files should be copied into the Zoo Tycoon 2 installation to add the new content properly.

description: File used by Zoo Tycoon 2, a video game that allows players to operate zoos; contains data used to display zoo animals, exhibits, and other scenery; typically used to extend game content with additional zoo animals.
